attributes.action: NHS COVID19 PASS for people tested positive
attributes.additional_details:
I request this pass, as all the people who have been tested positive so far, they already have immunisation for the virus, so they should have the same rights as the people who have 
had the vaccin. 
Specifically when comes to travel to different countries. They should be exempt from quarantine.
Thanks!
attributes.background: Offer the NHS COVID19 PASS to people who have been tested positive for COVID 19, within the last 6-12 months, and finished their self isolation period .

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Entry requirements for other countries are a matter for those Governments and not the UK Government or Parliament.
